      • getBuildFile

        public File getBuildFile(ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem)
                  throws BuildTarget.MissingBuildFileException
        The build file in which this rule was defined.
        Throws:
        BuildTarget.MissingBuildFileException - if the build file for the target does not exist.

      • getBuildFilePath

        public Path getBuildFilePath()

      • getShortName

        public String getShortName()
        If this build target were //third_party/java/guava:guava-latest, then this would return "guava-latest". Note that the flavor of the target is included here.

      • getShortNameOnly

        public String getShortNameOnly()

      • getFlavor

        public Flavor getFlavor()

      • getBaseName

        public String getBaseName()
        If this build target were //third_party/java/guava:guava-latest, then this would return "//third_party/java/guava".

      • getBaseNameWithSlash

        public String getBaseNameWithSlash()
        If this build target were //third_party/java/guava:guava-latest, then this would return "//third_party/java/guava/".

      • getBaseNameWithSlash

        @Nullable
public static String getBaseNameWithSlash(@Nullable
                                   String baseName)
        Helper function for getting BuildTarget base names with a trailing slash if needed. If baseName were //third_party/java/guava, then this would return "//third_party/java/guava/". If it were //, it would return //.

      • getBasePath

        public String getBasePath()
        If this build target were //third_party/java/guava:guava-latest, then this would return "third_party/java/guava". This does not contain the "//" prefix so that it can be appended to a file path.

      • getBasePathWithSlash

        public String getBasePathWithSlash()
        Returns:
        the value of getBasePath() with a trailing slash, unless getBasePath() returns the empty string, in which case this also returns the empty string

      • getFullyQualifiedName

        public String getFullyQualifiedName()
        If this build target is //third_party/java/guava:guava-latest, then this would return "//third_party/java/guava:guava-latest".
